text: w'idha ttla ealaa kafaar "mk" ayat allah wadhat qalu: ma muhamad 'iilaa rajul yarghab 'ana yamnaekum ean eibadat alalihat alty kan yebdha abawkm, wqalu: ma hdha alquran aldhy ttlwh ealayna -ya mhmd- 'iilaa kadhab mkhtlq, jyt bih min eind nfsk, walays min eind allh, waqal alkufaar ean alquran lamaa ja'hm: ma hdha 'illa sihr wadh
